summary.para: The CRYPT_PKCS12_PBE_PARAMS structure contains parameters used to create an encryption key, initialization vector (IV), or Message Authentication Code (MAC) key for a PKCS #12 password based encryption algorithm.

remarks.para: The buffer that contains the salt immediately follows the CRYPT_PKCS12_PBE_PARAMS structure.
The and functions consume the CRYPT_PKCS12_PBE_PARAMS structure as an structure in the pParameterList parameter.
The PKCS #12 standard recommends a value of 1024 or greater for the iIterations member.

summary.para: An integer that specifies the number of hashes of the password and salt that are used to create the key.
An integer that specifies the size, in bytes, of the salt used to create the key.
